timeline.message: Regenerate codegen using updated Swagger containing IndexParametersConfiguration
Remove client side validation from codegen
Added custom types into public API and removed converters where possible
Regenerate with codegen constructor Javadoc fix, added RevApi suppressions for new annotations and annotation attributes

timeline.bodyText: Is this class a facet query result? if so, we should only explore the getter to user but not the setter.
timeline.author: mssfang

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I'll create an APIView for this change given the amount of code that is being moved around due to Swagger generation changes.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Going to leave this as is as the Map is mutable using the getter so there is no big reason to hide the setter.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, if these were autorest updates for client-side validations that were removed?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Yes, client side validation generation was removed.
replies.author: alzimmermsft
